animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]The Parents Council, according to Decree 1075 of 2015, “it’s a body of participation for parents of the educational establishment, aimed at ensuring their continued participation in the educational process and to raise the results of quality of service”.

The parents’ representatives on the Board of Directors are Mr. Jairo Arias Tabares and Mrs. Eliana Arboleda Jaramillo, who also serves as the president of the Parents’ Council. For the current academic year, Mrs. María Camila Cruz Rosas has been appointed as the secretary of this participatory body.

Parents can contact the Parents’ Council by emailing consejodepadres2024-2025@colegiocanadiense.edu.co.
